description: Did you know mac and cheese can be made in one tray? Our creamy one-pan mac and cheese topped with a crunchy parmesan crumb is perfect for family dinners.
name: Mac and Cheese Traybake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tray from oven and stir pasta mixture. Add tasty cheese, mozzarella and cream, then stir to combine. Season with pepper. Top with breadcrumb mixture. Bake, uncovered, for a further 10 minutes or until golden. Serve immediately.
